author: Dhwani Desai
title: Yash's Mr & Mrs Ramachari now in Marathi
text:
The Yash- and Radhika Pandit-starrer Mr & Mrs Ramachari was one of the most successful movies last year. The film won critical and mass acclaim, and after running in theatres for more than 100 days, it is all set to be released in a new avatar. The official Marathi remake is gearing up to hit theatres on January 8, 2016.
Mr & Mrs Sadachari , the Marathi remake, has Marathi actors Vaibhav Tatwawadi and Prarthana Behere reprising Yash and Radhika's role, respectively. It was slated to release on December 4, almost a year after the Kannada film, which was released on December 25, 2014.
The success of the Kannada film was such that it ran for over 100 days at theatres. It even bagged several awards, including best film, best actor, best actress, best director, best music director, best lyricist and even those playing supporting roles.
Santhosh Ananddram, the director of Mr & Mrs Ramachari confirmed to Belgaum Times that Mr & Mrs Sadachari is indeed the official remake of his movie, adding that the rights have been given for the movie to be remade in Tamil, Telugu and Hindi as well. Apart from this, Mr & Mrs Ramachari will also be dubbed in Malayalam, Punjabi and Bhojpuri.
